N1 Shooting game in the world

Classic game for learning accuracy with simple mechanics and praphics.
If you wanna try yourself for relax - bad idea. You will meet toxic community, many cheating players (thank you, F2P) and boring monotype gameplay.
This game can be good for few friends who decided to play together. Rent voice program server,  train your skill and go play MM in one own team - you will have high chance to get positive emotions from CS. 
Oh, sure, attention - be polite, in this game trust factor system exist. This system check your movement in game and make groups in same TF category for interfere toxic people contact with positive players. It sounds good, yeah, but you will lost high TF fast, because every your lucky shot will be reported by low-skill opponents and every report make your TF lower and lower, so get ready for it.
Anyway, i think, this game is only for old-school guys who respect CS and cant to deal in another same (new) projects or maybe have nostalgia about old CS. Yes, this guys will get enjoy.
